Package com.github.oeuvres.alix.lucene

Class AlixSAXIndexer

java.lang.Object
org.xml.sax.helpers.DefaultHandler
com.github.oeuvres.alix.lucene.AlixSAXIndexer
All Implemented Interfaces:
ContentHandler, DTDHandler, EntityResolver, ErrorHandler
public class AlixSAXIndexer extends DefaultHandler
An XML parser allowing to index XML or HTMTL. Index an xml file of lucene documents. React to the namespace uri xmlns:alix="https://oeuvres.github.io/alix". The element <alix:document> contains a document. The element <alix:field> contains a field.

NOTE: This indexer do not reuse fields and document object, because the fields provided by source are not predictable.

    • setFileName

      public void setFileName(String fileName) throws IOException
      Provide a filename for the documents to be processed. All document from this source will be indexed with this token. This keyword should be unique for the entire index. All documents from this filename will deleted before indexation.
      Parameters:
      fileName - The source fileName of the documents.
      Throws:
      IOException - Lucene errors.
